document.full_text: johnson & johnson's stelara helped a significantly higher percentage of crohn's disease sufferers than those who received a placebo, according to a study of patients who had not been helped by other commonly used drugs.
document.title: crohn's patients respond to j&j's stelara in study
lines_and_colors: johnson & johnson's stelara helped a significantly higher percentage of crohn's disease sufferers than those who received a placebo, according to a study of patients who had not been helped by other commonly used drugs.
